channel.title: 漏洞分析 on Huamang
channel.description: Recent content in 漏洞分析 on Huamang

item.title: [CVE-2022-40871] Dolibarr任意添加管理员与RCE漏洞分析
item.description: 漏洞简介 Dolibarr ERP & CRM <=15.0.3 is vulnerable to Eval injection. By default, any administrator can be added to the installation page of dolibarr, and if successfully added, malicious code can be inserted into the database and then execute it by eval. CVE编号：CVE-2022-2633 漏洞描述：D

item.title: [CVE-2022-2633] WordPress All-in-One插件SSRF+任意文件下载
item.description: 漏洞简介 CVE编号：CVE-2022-2633 漏洞描述：WordPress的All-in-One视频库插件存在任意用户的任意文件下载和SSR
